html:
PFH Technology Group, a provider of information and communication technology solutions to enterprise and government organizations, has acquired TerraAlto Ltd , an Amazon Web Services (AWS) advanced consulting partner and managed service provider partner, specialized in providing AWS native digital transformation solutions and services to its clients. Both the companies are based in Ireland

Cormac Hogan is the founder and CEO of TerraAlto.

Deal In Brief

Deal TypeAcquisition
Sub-Category100% Acquisition
Deal StatusCompleted: 2021-12-19

Deal Participants

Target (Company)TerraAlto Ltd.
Acquirer (Company)PFH Technology Group

Deal Rationale

The transaction enables PFH Technology to further strengthens its service propositions across the ICT spectrum.

% Acquisition100%
